sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, Card, CardContent, Divider, Chip, List, ListItem, ListItemText, ListItemIcon, CircularProgress, Button, IconButton, Tooltip, Tab, Tabs, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, } from "@mui/material"; import HomeButton from "./HomeButton"; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip as RechartsTooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, LineChart, Line, } from "recharts"; // Simulated data for dashboard const facilityData = [ { name: "Tampa General Hospital", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "High", readinessScore: 85, bedCapacity: 1011, emergencyStaff: 287, }, { name: "Memorial Hermann Hospital", state: "TX", hazardLevel: "Very High", readinessScore: 92, bedCapacity: 657, emergencyStaff: 198, }, { name: "Orlando Regional Medical Center", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "High", readinessScore: 79, bedCapacity: 808, emergencyStaff: 235, }, { name: "Methodist Hospital", state: "TX", hazardLevel: "Very High", readinessScore: 81, bedCapacity: 573, emergencyStaff: 178, }, { name: "North Florida Regional Medical Center", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "Extreme", readinessScore: 88, bedCapacity: 432, emergencyStaff: 156, }, { name: "West Florida Hospital", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "High", readinessScore: 77, bedCapacity: 531, emergencyStaff: 167, }, { name: "Bayshore Medical Center", state: "TX", hazardLevel: "High", readinessScore: 75, bedCapacity: 364, emergencyStaff: 122, }, { name: "Doctors Hospital of Sarasota", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "Moderate", readinessScore: 82, bedCapacity: 155, emergencyStaff: 87, }, { name: "Corpus Christi Medical Center", state: "TX", hazardLevel: "Very High", readinessScore: 84, bedCapacity: 413, emergencyStaff: 135, }, { name: "Kendall Regional Medical Center", state: "FL", hazardLevel: "High", readinessScore: 80, bedCapacity: 417, emergencyStaff: 143, }, ]; const hazardDistribution = [ { name: "Extreme", value: 1 }, { name: "Very High", value: 3 }, { name: "High", value: 5 }, { name: "Moderate", value: 1 }, { name: "Low", value: 0 }, ]; const stateDistribution = [ { name: "Florida", value: 6 }, { name: "Texas", value: 4 }, { name: "Georgia", value: 0 }, { name: "Louisiana", value: 0 }, { name: "Other", value: 0 }, ]; const monthlyIncidents = [ { month: "Jan", incidents: 12 }, { month: "Feb", incidents: 9 }, { month: "Mar", incidents: 15 }, { month: "Apr", incidents: 23 }, { month: "May", incidents: 28 }, { month: "Jun", incidents: 37 }, { month: "Jul", incidents: 42 }, { month: "Aug", incidents: 58 }, { month: "Sep", incidents: 61 }, { month: "Oct", incidents: 47 }, { month: "Nov", incidents: 31 }, { month: "Dec", incidents: 19 }, ]; const resourceDistribution = [ { name: "Beds Available", value: 4361 }, { name: "Beds Occupied", value: 1500 }, ]; // Color constants matching the app's theme const COLORS = ["#FF6600", "#FF8533", "#FFA366", "#FFBF99", "#FFD9CC"]; const BLUE_COLORS = ["#003366", "#004080", "#004d99", "#0059b3", "#0066cc"]; function LocalDashboard() { const [tabValue, setTabValue] = useState(0); const handleTabChange = (event, newValue) => { setTabValue(newValue); }; return ( Disaster Preparedness Dashboard Real-time monitoring and status of HCA facilities in high-risk areas {/* Dashboard Tabs */} {/* Tab 1: Overview */} {tabValue === 0 && ( {/* Key Statistics Cards */} Total Facilities 10 in high-risk areas Average Readiness 82% across all facilities Total Bed Capacity 5,361 72% currently available Emergency Staff 1,708 trained for crisis response {/* Yearly Incident Trend */} Hurricane & Severe Weather Incidents (2023) Peak season observed from August to October with 166 total incidents recorded in 2023 {/* Distribution Charts */} Facilities by Hazard Level `${name}: ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%` } outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {hazardDistribution.map((entry, index) => ( ))} 40% of facilities are in High or Very High hazard zones, requiring prioritized resource allocation. {/* Alert Status */} Current Alert Status Tropical Storm Watch Affecting: South Florida facilities Issued: Oct 15, 2023 - 08:00 EST Hurricane Warning Affecting: Gulf Coast facilities Issued: Oct 14, 2023 - 18:30 EST All Clear Affecting: Georgia facilities Issued: Oct 13, 2023 - 12:15 EST )} {/* Tab 2: Facility Status */} {tabValue === 1 && ( High Risk Facilities Facility Name State Hazard Level Readiness Score Bed Capacity Emergency Staff {facilityData.map((facility) => ( {facility.name} {facility.state} = 90 ? "#4caf50" : facility.readinessScore >= 80 ? "#2196f3" : facility.readinessScore >= 70 ? "#ff9800" : "#f44336", mr: 1, }} /> {facility.readinessScore}% {facility.bedCapacity} {facility.emergencyStaff} ))}
{/* Readiness Distribution */} Readiness Score Distribution [ `${value}%`, "Readiness Score", ]} labelFormatter={(value) => facilityData[value].name} /> Memorial Hermann Hospital has the highest readiness score at 92%, while Bayshore Medical Center has the lowest at 75%. {/* State Distribution */} Facilities by State `${name}: ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%` } outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {stateDistribution.map((entry, index) => ( ))} )} {/* Tab 3: Resource Allocation */} {tabValue === 2 && ( {/* Resource Cards */} Emergency Supplies 92% of target inventory Backup Power 100% of facilities equipped Water Reserves 78% of target capacity Evacuation Routes 10/10 facilities with verified plans {/* Resource Charts */} Bed Capacity Utilization `${name}: ${value} (${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%)` } outerRadius={100} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > 5,861 total beds across high-risk facilities with 4,361 (74%) currently available Critical Resources by Facility Facility Emergency Power Water Supply Medical O₂ {facilityData.slice(0, 5).map((facility) => ( {facility.name} 0.2 ? "Operational" : "Limited" } color={Math.random() > 0.2 ? "success" : "warning"} /> 0.3 ? "Sufficient" : "Low"} color={Math.random() > 0.3 ? "success" : "warning"} /> 0.1 ? "Adequate" : "Critical" } color={Math.random() > 0.1 ? "success" : "error"} /> ))}
{/* Recommended Actions */} Recommended Resource Actions )} ); } export default LocalDashboard;
